item.title: mongo snippets: array cheatsheet
item.description: Cheatsheet - Array Of Values A short cheat sheet for working with arrays in mongodb queries and aggregations. Inspired by: Mongo Doc - Update Array Operator document structure For all following examples we assume a collection named “arrays” with at least on document of the following structure: { "tags": ["A", "B", "C"] } create Creation is very straight forward so we will skip this part here. query Basic query operation on elements.
